1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Hakam bin Sufyan Ath-Thawri that:He saw the Messenger of Allah perform ablution then take a handful of water and sprinkle it over his private area to remove any doubts about urine drippings

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي النَّضْحِ بَعْدَ الْوُضُوءِ
